DOC.detailed_description: The outcome measure use MADRS ( Montgomery-Asberg Depression Rating Scale ) . This administered baseline fortnightly basis . At study end response criterion define 50 % reduction total MADRS score remission define MADRS score less equal 10 . Other outcome measure administer fortnightly : BPRS ( Brief Psychiatric Rating Scale ) , CORE ( measure melancholic symptom ) , BDI ( Beck Depression Inventory ) , CGI ( Clinical Global Impression Scale ) , GAF ( Global Assessment Functioning Scale ) . A cognitive battery also administer .
